G

generateBgFile(String, String) - Static method in class training_utils.ImageUtils
Takes a directory of images and generates a bg file (a list of filenames in the directory) for OpenCV
generateBgFile - Variable in class util.ProgramArguments
 
generateBgFileDirPath - Variable in class util.ProgramArguments
 
generateBgFileFileName - Variable in class util.ProgramArguments
 
getBiggestSquare(List<List<opencv_core.Point>>) - Static method in class util.StaticUtils
Takes a List of squares where each square is a List of four Points (doesn't strictly have to be a square) and returns the one with the largest area.
getLines(opencv_core.Mat, int) - Static method in class util.StaticUtils
Calls OpenCV HoughLinesP() and all necessary transformations on the source image.
getPaperTransformation(opencv_core.Mat) - Static method in class util.StaticUtils
Takes an image, finds a paper in it and returns a transformation that would scale the paper over the whole image.
getRobotPositionInGraph(opencv_core.Point) - Method in class base.ImageGraph
A function to determine where is the closest in the graph to a selected Point
groupLines(List<Pair<opencv_core.Point, opencv_core.Point>>, List<Pair<opencv_core.Point, opencv_core.Point>>, List<Pair<opencv_core.Point, opencv_core.Point>>, int) - Static method in class util.StaticUtils
Takes the output of getLines() and groups the lines into vertical and horizontal lines which are at least threshold apart from each other.
groupPoints(List<opencv_core.Point>, double) - Static method in class util.StaticUtils
Takes a List of Points and groups the Points so that the distance between any two groups is at least threshold.
